sys_security_acl.description: Allow write for sun in NBSE Assignment, for users with role x_nyk_nbse_time_ca.nbse_assignment_write, and if the ACL script returns true.
sys_security_acl.name: x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment.sun

sys_update_version.name: sys_security_acl_bde43848db8344101a9df77c29961989
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow write for sun in NBSE Assignment, for users with role x_nyk_nbse_time_ca.nbse_assignment_write, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment.sun</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[answer = true;
var au = new global.ArrayUtil();
var day = 'sun';
var ALL = 'all';

var lockTimesheetForDays = current.timesheet.lock_timesheet_for_days.toString().split(',');
if (au.contains(lockTimesheetForDays, day) || au.contains(lockTimesheetForDays, ALL)) {
	answer = false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>MANUJAG</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-13 17:59:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bde43848db8344101a9df77c29961989</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_nyk_nbse_time_ca_nbse_assignment.sun</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NBSE Time Card" source="x_nyk_nbse_time_ca">00e16545dbf604901a9df77c2996198a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NBSE Time Card">00e16545dbf604901a9df77c2996198a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_bde43848db8344101a9df77c29961989</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>GARGL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-21 06:01:53</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
